entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:23 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -42.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 03:56 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -42.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -47.3°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 02:31 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 02:31 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
